basic.description:
An introduction to the study of British rule in India. This course examines the impact of the colonial governance of India on Britain from the mid-eighteenth century to Independence.
LEARNING HOURS    360 (72S;288P)
basic.subject: HIST
basic.title: The British and India, 1765-1947

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITE    A Grade of C+ in 6.0 units from HIST 300-329 and registration in a HIST Major or Medial Plan.
